Our mission is to make building websites and business systems easier for everyone.

The Karout Foundation was built on the idea that high-quality, functional website templates and themes should be available to everyone. Use our free, open source products, or support us by purchasing one of our premium products or services.

Our founding

This company was established on August 17, 2023 and is located in Syria - Damascus - Al-Qassa
